SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN UMICS.SUM_CONFLICTS IS NOT NULL AND UMICS.SUM_CONFLICTS > 0 AND UMICS.ALRT_PROD_DATA_CONFLICT_CRITERIA = 'Y' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS dataConflictCount, SUM(CASE WHEN ALRT_PROD_DELAY_COMM_REQ = 'Y' AND UNIT_STATUS IN ('ISSUED','CONFIRM', 'CLOSED')
AND (TRANSPORT_TYPE = 'O' OR ACT_PROD_DATE IS NULL)
THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS delayCommReqCount, SUM(CASE WHEN ALRT_PROD_DELV_DT_EARLY = 'Y' AND UNIT_STATUS IN ('ISSUED','CONFIRM', 'CLOSED')
AND TRANSPORT_TYPE = 'O'
THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS deliveryDateEarlyCount, SUM(CASE WHEN ALRT_PROD_DELV_DT_LATE = 'Y' AND UNIT_STATUS IN ('ISSUED','CONFIRM', 'CLOSED')
AND TRANSPORT_TYPE = 'O'
THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS deliveryDateLateCount, SUM(CASE WHEN ALRT_PROD_DELV_DT_OUT_OF_RANGE = 'Y' AND UNIT_STATUS IN ('ISSUED','CONFIRM', 'CLOSED') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS deliveryDateOutOfRangeCount, SUM(CASE WHEN ALRT_PROD_EST_DELV_PAST_DUE = 'Y' AND UNIT_STATUS IN ('ISSUED','CONFIRM', 'CLOSED')
AND TRANSPORT_TYPE = 'O'
THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS estDeliveryDatePastDueCount, SUM(CASE WHEN ALRT_PROD_EST_PROD_PAST_DUE = 'Y' AND UNIT_STATUS IN ('ISSUED','CONFIRM', 'CLOSED') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS estProductionDatePastDueCount, SUM(CASE WHEN UMICS.SUM_MISSING_INFO IS NOT NULL AND UMICS.SUM_MISSING_INFO > 0 AND (UMICS.ALRT_PROD_MISSING_INFO_CRITERIA = 'Y' OR UMICS.ALRT_PROD_DELV_MISSING_INFO_CRITERIA = 'Y') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS missingInfoCount, SUM(CASE WHEN ALRT_PROD_PROD_DT_EARLY = 'Y' AND UNIT_STATUS IN ('ISSUED','CONFIRM', 'CLOSED') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS prodDateEarlyCount, SUM(CASE WHEN ALRT_PROD_PROD_DT_LATE = 'Y' AND UNIT_STATUS IN ('ISSUED','CONFIRM', 'CLOSED') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS prodDateLateCount, SUM(CASE WHEN ALRT_PROD_PROD_DT_OUT_OF_RANGE = 'Y' AND UNIT_STATUS IN ('ISSUED','CONFIRM', 'CLOSED') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS prodDateOutOfRangeCount, SUM(CASE WHEN ALRT_PROD_PROD_HOLDS = 'Y' AND UNIT_STATUS IN ('ISSUED','CONFIRM', 'CLOSED')
AND TRANSPORT_TYPE = 'O'
THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS prodHoldsCount FROM SMC.SMC_PRODUCTION_SUMMARY PRSUM LEFT JOIN SMC.V_SMC_UNIT_MISSING_INFO_AND_CONFLICTS_SUMS UMICS ON UMICS.MASTER_ID = PRSUM.MASTER_ID WHERE VENDOR_ID IS NOT NULL AND VENDOR_ID IN (
#{associatedVendorId}
)
